entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
